text: West Africa or Western Africa is the western part of Africa. According to the United Nations (UN), West Africa has seventeen countries: * Benin * Burkina Faso * Cape Verde * CÃ´te d'Ivoire * Gambia * Ghana * Guinea * Guinea-Bissau * Liberia * Mali * Mauritania * Morocco * Niger * Nigeria * Senegal * Sierra Leone * Togo Category:Regions of Africa
title: West Africa
